repairedDockerfile:
# 
# hddtemp Dockerfile 
# 
# Pull base image. 
FROM ubuntu 
MAINTAINER Drewster727 

# Install hddtemp 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install build-essential hddtemp && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Define default command. 
# example = -d --listen localhost --port 7634 /dev/s* 
CMD hddtemp $HDDTEMP_ARGS
